name: April Ray
text: I just needed a couple copies of my apartment key so that if I got locked out I would have one hidden. I didn't really want to go and deal with Lowe's or Walmart because frankly Walmart scares me right now. The kiosk was in the front of the store. I never had to directly interact with anyone which was a plus. It was simple put the key in like you're putting it in the door and pick out which key you want and I was going to get two keys and it said that I could get a key for free so I ended up getting three keys for everything included around $20. It didn't take that long. They all worked in my door and I made sure that I did the fingerprint in case I ever get locked out of my apartment. All I have to do is go to the kiosk and do the fingerprint and get another key. That's worth its weight in gold. Above all I was very pleased except for I could have got it cheaper somewhere else but sometimes you get what you pay for. I would use them again..

resp.text: Hello April, thanks for your review. We would love to hear more about your experience with our key copy kiosk, so that we can use your valuable feedback to deliver an even better experience next time. Please reach out to our service team at (855) 343-5776 or email at support@key.me with any further suggestions you wish to share. name: LP Washington
text: On June 19th, 2021 during the torrential downpour of rain and flash flooding from Tropical Storm Claudette in Tuscaloosa I locked myself out of my SUV at Publix on 69 South. When I call Tuscaloosa Security lock and key the gentleman answered on the first or second ring even though he was clearly busy. He took down my number and called me back as he said he would. Despite the dangerous driving conditions he made it to my vehicle in a very timely manner. He was kind, professional and courteous. If I ever have a need in the future I will insist that my insurance contact them instead of these chains that they like to use. I encourage anyone that needs any kind of lock and key or unlock service to support this local business! The personable service made my day. Thank you Tuscaloosa Security Lock and Key!

name: David Posey
text: Today I had a lockout incident that was partially 100% my fault. I found myself locked out of my company vehicle, but it was lunch time and I couldn't be bothered. After I finished my lunch truck delicacies I rang up JC as he came highly recommended from a friend. (Google) I then proceeded to confess to him what I had done as though he was a Catholic Priest. He assured me everything was going to be ok, and that he would be there soon. I patiently waited for him to arrive, I wasn't going anywhere.... He arrived in what can only be described as a cloud from heaven with four wheels and quickly opened my vehicle ending my peril. Sure at the start of my ordeal, he and I were complete strangers, but by the end of it we both agreed that it seemed like we had known each other since high school. So ask yourself: do you want any old locksmith to come and just unlock your car? or would you like to have a cloud traveling lock Avenger straight out of a Marvel movie come get you out of danger and a cool story to tell? (Mic drop) Thank you JC for your help, honesty, and integrity.

resp.text: Well, it was my pleasure to assist you today and I truly thank you for reviewing my services. It was great to see you again after all these years and I absolutely love the awesomely kind words.

name: Heath Campbell
text: Justin came to my home to pick the lock on my vintage Funhouse pinball machine which I haven't been able to use for many years due to a lost key. He was able to pick the lock and even made me two new keys while he was here.  In addition I had a gumball machine with a lost key which he was able to open for me.  I cannot thank Justin enough for his work. He came to my home the same day I called him and he arrived exactly the time we agreed on.  He was both professional and friendly.  I highly recommend JC Lock & key to anyone who needs any locksmith service!

resp.text: Thank you very much for reviewing my services today! It was a great pleasure to provide service for you and I hope you all have a wonderful time playing that pinball machine! Have a wonderful night and rest of the week!

name: Rachel
text:
Justin is great! We found him on yelp when searching for someone to re-key our new home and sent a request for a quote. Every bit of communication with him was exceptionally professional, and he spent a lot of time explaining different options to us and giving us advice.

He had an emergency call come up on the way to our house (which didn't bother me at all, since I would want someone to prioritize me if I was locked out of my house) and kept us updated the whole time. So, even though our schedule ended up being a little different than originally planned, he kept us informed the whole time so we knew exactly what to expect.

At the house, he worked quickly and efficiently, and he was intentional to follow COVID-19 precautions. And of course his price was the best of the quotes we received. We highly recommend him and will call him again if we have need for a locksmith!

resp.text: Thank you so very much for taking the time to review my services! It was such a pleasure to meet you all and I am grateful for the opportunity to provide service for you. Have a wonderful weekend and congratulations on your new home!

name: C.J. Sealy
text:
First off, I will say this:    A1 Locksmith did fine making the key for my motorcycle. They do know what they are doing.

However, what is disappointing is that I was told $35 dollars on the phone. I put my motorcycle on the trailer and took it there the next day (lost key).  The key making process went well but once we got to the register, i was rung up for $58 dollars. I explained to the owner that I was told it would be 35 and drove by 2 other places that charged 50.  He asked who I spoke with on the phone and continued to tell me that I wasn't told that. Even with 3 employees there, He told me I wouldn't have spoken with anyone but him.

Overall, the service was okay but the prices were bait and switch. No cheaper than other locksmiths. I was lied to about the price. Good service but bad business practices. He did nothing to make it right.

text: Highly priced for what I got.  When they arrived, much later than they told me, they asked how we had tried to get in and then used the tools we tried with, instead of their own.  They left a dent in the frame and the door and tried to hammer it back in with a screwdriver.

name: Cynthia Zuniga
text: Got the job done in less then 5 mins! 10/10

name: Kevin W
text: After having keys that didn't work made at three different hardware stores over the past year I decided to give a locksmith a try at it. I walked into A-1 and they used a machine just like what is used at the hardware stores. So I was sitting there expecting that these keys would not work. Since they were not doing anything "special" to make the keys, I asked why the key they were making was going to work and the others I had made would not. The locksmith told me that because locks and keys are their business, they regularly calibrate their machines (something that hardware stores do not always do). To my delight, all 4 keys I had made worked when I got home. They made my keys in seconds, did for cheaper than the hardware stores, and they actually worked! I will use them for all my future lock and key needs!

text: We lost the only set of keys we had to drive our 2014 Toyota Corolla. I called Toyota and was given a quote of $480 and I was told my vehicle would also need to be towed to their facility, and my car would be ready in the next day or 2. They told me this was the ONLY way to get it done. I was devastated. What an expensive mistake!! After the shock wore off I decided to call a locksmith and see what they could do, or if they had any other suggestions.. I ended up speaking with Cindy (who sounds like an angel) and she gave me great news that her and her husband William could help us for a VERY reasonable price, and they would come to my house to do it!! In less than an hour everything was finished up and working great!! They were wonderful to meet and they really saved us BIG TIME!! I would reccomend them in a heartbeat!! I don't usually leave reviews but I felt truly blessed today and I wanted to pay it forward!! ♡

text: I have had the best experience as my first lockout on this very cold morning. I left my keys in the ignition and not only closed the door but locked it. We did not want to leave the vehicle unattended this way while await my mother's awakening and bringing of the additional key. He was very understanding of this! The response time was excellent and the prices are fantastic. They are based out of Auburn but did not mind coming to Columbus. Even after I wasn't sure, he was reassuring that he would be able to help and come unlock the vehicle at a great rate.  Mr. Burns came and the job was completed in 5 minutes or less! No worries if you need them, they also answer the phone promptly 24/7 as well. I can't say thank you enough Mr. Burns and Unlock it, superb service and customer service!✨

So, we had a trumpet case that was locked when the new trumpet came in. Dad was at work and the family was stumped.

Locksmith was on the way and Dad was willing to pay anyway, because he's smarter than the average bear.

text: Allison and the young man who was with her went over and beyond to help with my car. I am grateful and very appreciative. Thanks you guys!!

name: jason black
text:
Called to schedule a key fob to be re-programmed. On the scheduled date/ time no one showed.  I waited about 30 min and called. Another lady answered and said she would send a message for the lady to contact me. Never got a call until 3 hrs later when the lady was looking for my address. Granted she was nice and helpful. She found out the key fob was not for my car (bought used at auction). She said she would order a fob and it would come pre-programmed and would actually be cheaper than a regular programming. "Just give it 3-5 business days to get here." A week passed. Two weeks. I called again and got "I'll have ???? call you back." No call. It's been almost two months. TERRIBLE CUSTOMER SERVICE!!! I know things happen, but really???

Got a follow up call from Allison regarding the post. She was very attentive and apologetic. Based on some other reviews a few months ago, and getting some info from Allison, I think I know where the problem was. She assured me she would try to get the fob which  was (and aparently still is) on back order to make make it right. I've added one star due to the fact that Allison promptly messaged and then called (they still had my information on file) after receiving my post. If she can come through,  I'll gladly update the rating. Sometimes there are bad employees and products are defective, but good customer service is what makes up for those things. Thank you Allison!

resp.text: your order shipped today via FedEx we expected to come in this week by Friday

text:
They programmed a key that did not work a week later.  That was after I waited until 10:00 at night for the girl to get here. She never sent me the paperwork to be able to get reimbursed by insurance company after numerous attempts to contact her.  I even contacted the Birmingham office and explained the situation and they contacted Auburn office, but she never sent the paperwork.    I even put gas in her car from my lawnmower gas can so she would not run out of gas because I live in a rural area.  DO NOT USE THIS COMPANY!!

JUNE 2, 2019 UPDATE:  I did as you requested, Robert, and contacted you via the CONTACT US link at unlock it for me.  I attached several screen shots of my communication with your employee and have not received a call from you nor the requested paperwork.  Please advise.

resp.text: Hey there Kelli if you could get in touch with me I'm confident I can resolve your issue. If you would please use the contact form on our site - my name is Robert. Our keys come with a 30 day warranty. If you're experiencing an issue due to a faulty part or service procedure we will replace that key for you.

name: Tania Cobine
text: Purchased 3 keys a little while ago, 1 for my car 2 for my girls. They had issues programming the  key for my car but got it sorted out. After only a couple weeks it stopped working and said bad key when inserted. They didn’t replace the key but just reprogrammed it again. Tonight it came up bad key once again, called and they said they would call with a time someone could come. Waited for just under an hour and had to call them again. They couldn’t get anyone out that night(really need to change website guaranteeing service in as little as 15 to 30 mins) and couldn’t guarantee the next day either. The key should have been replaced the first time it stopped working. I can accept it happening once but twice is unacceptable, inconvenient as I was stranded with my 2 youngest in the car after a soccer game late at night. I will be calling another company and will make sure the mechanic that told us to use them won’t be recommending them again.

I was very hopeless and was thinking to call a mechanic to drill the trunk locker but this guy magically took my keys from the trunk and solved the problem in a very good way. name: Kim Sirmans
text: My husband and I were blown away by the level of customer service this company provided to us. After one of their locksmiths (who was very kind and professional) was unable to help us program a new key fob for our push-to-start, we were left stranded and unable to make a trip we’d been planning on leaving for today. When the owners learned this, they called and said they were coming in from out of town but could get to work for us right when they got back into town at 1 or 2 AM or first thing in the morning. Knowing we were planning on leaving early, they made it clear it was no problem for them to come as soon as they got into town, and they did! They suggested we leave the fobs on our front seat and they would program our fobs while we slept. Sure enough, when I woke up this morning at 7 AM I had a text from them saying they’d got it done and were on their way to bring me the reprogrammed fobs. Totally above and beyond. We were so grateful!!! Wow. Thank y’all again so so much!

text: Would recommend Brooks Lock and Key!  They were able to program two keys for my used 2019 F150 in which I only had one key upon purchasing it. The Ford Dealer in Athens wanted over $500 for the same job.  Their shop is amazing and would highly recommend them.

text: Our security system keypad failed on us and left my family of four sitting in the driveway. With it being New Years Day, I was sure I would run into trouble. One company said they were about to have dinner and we would probably have to stay at a hotel for the night. After being extremely disappointed, I tried Brooks Lock and Key. Before I could finish my sentence, Mr. Holmes was asking for our address. He made it to our home in just ten minutes and had us inside in no time. So thankful for him making the time to come out and help us in such need. He truly has a big heart. I will forever recommend his service.

Turns out it was a forklift key. They also replaced the lost key to our truck toolbox. They worked quickly, joked around with us, and were open later than other places around. Great local business that I'll definitely use again if I need them.

name: Stephanie Braswell
text:
I went into the store about a quote for a service call on getting a key made for the ignition and door on my car. I was quoted $52 for the key and service call. I waited for an hour for the man to show up and ended up calling him to see if he was close by. He ended up telling me later that I just needed to come pick the key up from his shop. Upon picking up the key he said my total was $72 because of the service call (which was never made) and key cost. When I got the key back home it didn’t even work. I called back about the key not working and he tried to charge me for fixing HIS mistake!! Now I have a key that won’t work and he won’t do anything to fix it.
-Anthony Terry-

resp.text:
Amazing- everything you just said is wrong.  You only half listened to anything I said.  As I tried to explain over the phone:  Your steering wheel is just in a bind and needs to be rocked out of its stuck position to allow the cylinder to turn.  I diagnosed the problem over the phone and you refused to follow those instructions to try to unstick the binding cylinder.

The code was right there on the lock you brought in.  A service call was not necessary, so I didn't charge you one.  My helper and I both worked for over an hour trying to get the key to work the lock you brought in.  Rather than charge you the normal hourly rate of $55/man-hour, I went with the original price I quoted which kept the price the same, even though it was way more work on us.

You called back on the phone berating me and accusing me of being a rip-off, raising your voice and cursing me- And, I offered to help you get the steering wheel unstuck, and you just got madder and yelled more.  Well, no, I'm definitely not coming out to your house to help you now.  You got a $250 job done for $72 and I guarantee there's nothing wrong with that key.

text: My husband and I were stranded in Hope Hull, Al with our car engine running and our doors somehow ended up locked. We were both out of the car and my husband discovered that the doors were locked.   We called Capital Auto Locksmith and Alan answered and said that he would be there in 10 minutes and HE WAS!!!! He was the nicest person And did exactly what he said he would do. If you need a locksmith in this area give him a call!!!’

text: We were in Montgomery on a business trip when we got locked out of our car.  We called Capital Auto Locksmith.  The guy they sent was extremely nice and helped us in a not so good situation.  He was very professional and got the job done.  I would definitely recommend Capital Auto Locksmith!

text: I had a great experience with them. Arrived quickly and was friendly.  Took less than 5 minutes to get the door open and took less than 5 minutes to make a key for the ignition and the door... seriously,  it was like watching mcgyver. Great work!! Highly recommend.

resp.text: Sorry for the confusion. We were having phone issues late Saturday afternoon. When you called the line was disconnected and all subsequent calls for the next 30 to 60 minutes went strait to voicemail. Please call and ask for Allen and we can discuss further.

name: Hayden Dean
text: They came the day I called! Great price, and the guy was super nice helped out a lot! Being a college student the last thing you want to do is lose your keys, but if you do this is by far the best and the cheapest in montgomery!

name: Jim Dye
text: These guys came to me thru AAA when my kid lost his  keys when we were 1/2 mile into the woods deer hunting. They promptly came out from Montgomery and he willingly took his vehicle as far as it could go off pavement. Guy had a great attitude and got me back on road. I'd hope to find his twin if i needed the help again.

name: D'Jara Britton
text: After dumbly locking my keys in my trunk and freaking out for 30 minutes, I called these guys. Alan answered the phone right away, took my information (he didn't even get frustrated when I didn't know the year of the car), quoted a price, and was at my house in FIVE minutes. My situation was a tricky one, and it took him less than 15 minutes to solve it. Alan was so friendly and helpful which was great because I was still trying not to cry. Price was on the lower end of quoted range even though I would have paid whatever he asked. Highly recommend.

name: Tonzi hardges
text: My sister  locked her car keys in the trunk of her car. She called her ins company for roadside assistance. A service tech came to assist and after a few attempts to unlock the trunk, he simply suggested a towing company and left me outside in the rain. After searching for other options my sister suggested to call Capital Auto Locksmith. The service tech was awesome and very nice. He was knowledgeable, efficient, and gave top notch customer service. I will recommend this company to anyone. Allen, you did a great job!!!

name: Elijah Lofgren
text: Great service. Friendly. Happy they can do chip keys like my Honda CRV.

name: Cj Head
text: Showed up in 10 minutes excellent customer service

name: Ryan Godfrey
text: I just bought a car with push button start that only came with one key. Frustrated, I started contacting several locksmiths and even the dealership. The particular key needed was a special order part everywhere but Capital Auto Locksmith. He promised me same-day service, and he delivered. The programming and cutting of the new key took about 15 minutes, and his price was the best among the four other locksmiths in town I contacted. If I went to the dealership, it would have been about $150 more expensive. I'm impressed and would recommend to anyone needing an additional key for their car.

name: Dave L
text: He quoted me a price on the phone and told me when he'd be here. He was here when he said he would be. He got my car open and back on the road quickly. Less than an hour from call to driving.  Thanks!  What more can you ask for?

text: Key to my 2015 Chevy Equinox broke off the FOB. Called the dealer and they wanted $100.00 to tow vehicle to the dealer, $100 to buy a new key, $135 to program new key and $135 to disable anti-theft mode and reprogram. I called Jubilee and they were at my work in 30 minutes, had the new key laser cut and the new FOB programmed in a matter of 15 minutes for less than half the price of what the dealer wanted. And they DID NOT have to disable the anti-theft mode. HIGHLY RECOMMEND JUBILEE. THANK YOU!!!

Edwin,

We apologize we were not able to help you the other day when you called.  Thank you for making us aware of our Google listing saying we were open 24/7.  We have reached out to Google and they have corrected our hours.

Best regards,
Jubilee Lock & Key

Nice, courteous, progressional.

We waited until 4:30pm called again and he said that he was still in Stapleton. I asked him what was the point of making an appt at 4pm if no one would be arriving at our scheduled appt  he said they couldn't guarantee appts after a certain time.I told him when I spoke to the lady yesterday she never mentioned that the appt would not be guarantee time that they would be there. Very unprofessional and the guy act like it was no big deal that he was not going to be there anytime soon.

text: This is not a 24 hour service.  I gave this establishment only 1 star because they’ve  appeared to misrepresent themselves.  I consider 24 hour service to be 24 hour service.

text: I got locked out of my workplace while on the clock, and time was of the essence. He’ll definitely be my go-to locksmith in case I mess up again! Can’t recommend these guys enough.

text: We just had a great experience with Anthony with Locksmith Express!  He was very professional and fast at changing out all the locks at out house.  He even fixed one of our locks that was not working properly.   He made sure the locks and keys worked after he rekeyed everything,   We felt like he was very fair and very reasonable.  He has been doing this for over 20 years and knows all the tricks of the trade.  This company responded to our need very quickly.  We would highly recommend this service!!

name: Richard Pustaver
text: This company is by far the best you will ever come about, i hate even putting this out here for selfish reasons of wanting to keep them to myself and my company. Mike and his son are just the best in the business they don’t ever give an excuse or over charge they just get it done. I have six fast food restaurants that rely heavily on this man and his business and his talent, our company will never use another locksmith besides him. If you are reading this take what I’m saying to the bank because if not you will be asking the bank for money if you use someone else.

text: Mike is the best and very nice! He was here very fast when we called about our dog locking us out the house by  jumping up on door and locking the top lock. text: Anthony was great! Arrived quickly and did a great job!  Will definitely use them again, 5 starts for sure!

text: Called for a quote to have the front door of our business rekeyed and his price was comparable to other locksmiths in the area, but he was able to come to me immediately.  He was very timely, very professional and nice, but what impressed me the most was that he discovered the last time our locks had been done, they were done incorrectly.  Anthony took the time to rebuild our locks and make sure we were secure in our building (when he could have left them the way they were and we wouldn't have known the difference).  I highly recommend this business and we will definitely call on Locksmith Express again.

He said give me just a moment...next thing I knew he’d given me a price and time to get to them, get the car unlocked, and a new car key made all within an hour and a half in a different city!!!! I was recommended Locksmith back in the summer and now for the 2nd time I know why. I recommend them to anyone!!

thanks you for the kind words.
happy holidays.

text: Michael did a great job and went the extra mile to make sure I had a working key to get my car started the same day.  He had to jump through some hoops to do it. Thanks again

Mike was great. Besides fixing my problem/offering options, what I really appreciated is that he was very communicative about his timing (keeping me updated on the arrival time he set, etc.). So helpful as I needed to do other things while waiting for him but didn't want to miss his arrival.
Will definitely recommend to others!

text: I felt like an idiot by losing the only key to my truck.  They made a bad situation better, plus they did it at a fair and reasonable price. Definitely recommend using them.

name: Heather Forrester
text: Prompt, professional and courteous. Anthony was all of those things and more. Several times he said that if it’s going to be done it should be done right. I appreciate that attitude so much. It is too often nowadays that people just do the bare minimum and don’t think about the problems that may arise down the road. Anthony went above and beyond to ensure my doors and locks were set up exactly as I needed them to be. And to top it off, the service was extremely affordable. I would definitely recommend Locksmith Express and will use them again if the need arises. Thank you Anthony! Sorry about the wet socks! :-)

name: Frank Saunders
text: Mike was amazing. I had no idea how to tackle the issue with my door lock but he immediately had multiple solutions for me. The mechanical door lock in my car door failed and I had lost the fob to the car 9 years ago. I was just expecting a fob that would unlock the doors but he made a brand new key fob that not only unlocks my car but also starts it. And he did it all in 15 minutes and the same day. Great experience all around.

name: Claribel Adeyemi
text: Michael did a great job on my car tonight, he literally made the impossible, possible!  I would highly recommend him and look forward to referring him to people in the future!

text: Mike really helped me with my ignition key situation. He was pleasant to speak with and  very knowledgeable and gave me much needed information to avoid issues in the future. I would recommend him to anyone any time for any lock problem.

name: Dylan Hein
text: From the first moment I was on the phone with them, to the very end of the service performed, these guys were 100% honest with me.  I needed my keys paired to a new PCM in my Lincoln LS and they were very clear that it may not work, but would still have to charge me a base rate if they came out.  They took the time, over 30 minutes total, to verify they could do it with their hardware/software while on the phone with me.  However, still honestly mentioned that sometimes it doesn't work out as the manual suggests.  Due to their honesty, and great rates, I decided to give them a try.  The service technician that came out was very polite and courteous and did a great job.  Keys were paired within 20 minutes and all was well.  A BIG thank you to Locksmith Express, you guys made my day!

name: Kevin Akers
text: Had a Ford that I needed a key made for, and some assistance with an anti-theft system part failure that was being experienced on vehicle.  Locksmith Express came to my shop promptly, and when he said he would.  He knew what he was doing, educated me on several aspects of the Ford system, and quickly cut a new key for it.  He then pinpointed where the anti-theft system failure was occurring in my system.  Only charged me a nominal amount for the new key and diagnosis.  The next day I ordered the part needed, installed it and the vehicle is back in action.  Very pleased with Locksmith Express and plan to use them exclusively going forward whenever I need a locksmith.

Anthony provided THE ABSOLUTE BEST CUSTOMER SERVICE I personally have ever had from a locksmith
He took his time with the original doors in my father's 1973 home.  Never complained when he had to do quite a bit of drilling to outfit our doors with new locksets...the doorknob locks we had were 35 years old!!
He went above and beyond and I would recommend this company to anyone and everyone who needs a locksmith
I called at 2 to schedule an appt for sat or next week.  Anthony arrived at my house at 330...just 90 mins after i called to request scheduling.

name: Jamison McClurg
text: No locksmith or mechanic wanted to come near my car due to the fact that they just couldn't figure out what was wrong with it everybody kept saying go to a locksmith so I called Mike told him what my problem was he said there was a 10% chance that we'd get it fixed because it might not be in his area of expertise. When he came he figured out what was going on with it and got the car so I can get it home. He didn't try to charge me for anything I didn't need. Every locksmith I called kept wanting to charge me $200 to get a new key cuz I swore that's what the problem was. Mike probably could have got me to buy a new key but he stayed legit and told me what my real problem was and didn't try to sell me things I didn't need. Very honest man and he knows his stuff. I will definitely always use him if I ever need a locksmith.

name: Shuntelique Threatt
text: Poorest service I've ever received. I waited an hr already for unlock for me when they told me it would only be 30min. That's why I decided to go with them since I was locked out of my apt with my newborn. Locksmith express contacted me and asked location basically a lot of questions the last rep already asked from a different company. As I asked questions locksmith express became upset that I asked questions and proceeded to hang up the phone in my face. Piss poor customer service

resp.text:
I'm sorry you had a difficult time getting a locksmith to help you get into your apartment. I work hard to provide fast, affordable and safe locksmith services. Phone calls go directly to me and I've reviewed my call history and service calls - I don't believe we spoke.

Perhaps if you were calling a number of locksmiths and you spoke to one of the national call numbers who route calls to local unlicensed operators. It is a problem we and other reputable locksmiths work hard to inform the public about.If you ever have to call a locksmtih, ask the person answering the phone their name and where they are located, then ask them what company they are with. You want to speak directly to a local company - not a call center.

My name is Michael, I own and operate this Locksmith Express and will be happy to speak to you  - thanks.

text: I have used this business several times in the past and was well pleased and recommended them to others. When I called on Nov 25 it seemed to have a change in ownership. Even though it was after the posted opening hours the person was not in the office yet and was unsure if he had the key I needed in stock. He said he would call me back from the office in less than an hour.  After over an hour of waiting I found a different locksmith closer to my home and got a better price!  By the Way, I had told him that I work 3rd shift and had been up all night. Obviously he has enough business and didn't care to make a new chip key for my truck.  I won't be back

name: Sherry Peters
text: We recently had the misfortune of a car break-down near Cullman on a Saturday afternoon while returning home to St. Louis from a family vacation.  Roger with Wilson's towing was the company contacted by AAA.   I can't say enough wonderful things about him.  He not only provided more assistance in finding a place to take our car than AAA did, but he also went the extra mile by calling later in the evening to check on us, and also helped us the following day in transporting us back to the repair shop.  He was professional, courteous, and beyond helpful.  A break-down in an unfamiliar town with 4 children was much less stressful because of Roger and his helpfulness.  I would recommend Wilson's towing to anyone in need of a quality towing company with a driver you can trust.

Their driver tried to back into my circle driveway and he ran off BOTH sides ...greatly damaging my NEWLY planted yard!! He also scraped the tire as he loaded it onto the wrecker. Not experienced! Furthermore, although I spoke with the owner originally when it happened,  I was expecting him to call me to pay for the damage like Mercedes directed him to do.
However, I have not heard from him and it has been more than 2 weeks. NOT RECOMMENDED

text: I purchased a brand new vehicle and lost all the keys the exact same day. I spent over 12 hours looking for the keys and could not find them. I called every Maserati dealership I could google in 8 different states. Every dealer told me the keys would run $1350-$1500 (per key fog) and I would have to wait at least 2 weeks for the key to be shipped from Italy. I decided to go to Facebook. I did think this company was a scam because of what I heard from the dealership and I got an immediate response. Tom was so nice. Mind you I’m in Mississippi and he was in Alabama. I said this just can’t be right. He told me I could have it towed and I would have to pay the fee still for the key. I didn’t mind, I just wanted my keys to my car that I’ve purchased for my 35th bday. Well, He said he would come to me. I said Nawl this can’t be right.  I asked could he come a week later. Agreed. I change it to 9-8 because of Labor Day. I sent a message asking were we still on for 9-8. He said, yes. A few minutes later he asked could he come today (Labor Day).... I said, it’s a holiday. He said I can come on. I timed him at like 4-5 hours according to google. I hear a knock. He left at 11:00 and arrived to my door at 2:27. I came in the house 10 seconds, I could hear the engine. I said no way. He programmed the keys. Cut the other keys, I can say a 10-20 minute job and he was on his way back. Very nice. Friendly and cool guy. Nice and professional van and I would recommend anyone. I mean anyone to his services. You WILL NOT BE DISAPPOINTED AT ALL. Thank you again.

text: Andy came to my rescue and saved my night. I called him Monday 7/6/2020 at 7:10 p.m. and explained to him that somehow I managed to leave the car key in the ignition and locked the car doors. Andy was the only one that answered the phone all the other companies that claim to offer 24 Hour services didn’t answer and I called several times before trying another company to call. I told him I was located in the Eastdale Mall parking lot and he told me he would be there in 15 minutes. He was there in 10 minutes. He was friendly, prompt, professional, & his services was completed before I could even blink an eye. Although, I was bummed out I had to spend $75 to get my car unlocked I was thankful that Andy was able to come to my rescue and that I was able to get back on the road and home safely. I have saved this company number and although I hope I won’t have to use the services again I will keep his number saved to have on standby just in case if I or anyone of my loved ones run into a similar situation like I did. text: Called for service when locked out of van. Dispatcher said 30 minutes...1 hour later when we called back she had not dispatched anyone because she said our phone number didn't show on her caller i.d. and she would call locksmith then. Called her back in 10 minutes to make sure she secured someone and she didn't remember talking to me, dispatching someone now.  Total wait of 2 hours later we got unlocked.  Brian was awesome, 5 minutes and he was done. Dispatch and her customer service was horrible.

resp.text: Thank you for your feedback. It made us aware of an issue that had to be addressed.  No customer should experience what you did. We would be happy to discuss this experience with you if you call 251.967.1919. Usually when people call us wanting an immediate response, they are already having a tough day. We work hard to help that day be better because they called us, not worse! Please accept our sincerest apologies for the way you were treated.

name: Gerry Thompson
text: We installed an programmable lock on our condo a little over a year ago.  It worked until recently - we contacted Aaron's Lock Service and they had a tech out the next day.  He was able to reprogram our lock and it is working again. Good Job!

resp.text: Thank you!

name: Joey Conwill
text: Aaron's was called out to our condo by someone that said they were staying there, had them sign a form then destroyed the lock to let them . It was a combination lock and there was a hidden key that would have overridden the lock if someone had bothered to contact the owner, or called the emergency number posted at the condo office, where a manager lives on the grounds. Aaron's said that was standard procedure, as long as the person signed the form, they could let them in. That's nice for all condo owners to know! Total cost to replace lock, almost $400. Aaron's took no responsibility. Not much integrity at this business.

resp.text: Integrity matters as well as ethical business practices.  We value and employ both in our business.  Emergency response locksmith technicians are there to help in challenging circumstances.  We do everything we can to gain entry before we considering drilling the lock.  This is a last resort.  We are sorry your lock was damaged but your renter misrepresented themselves as having authority to do so and chose to assume liability for such activity, just as they choose to assume liability for their treatment of the rest of your property when they rent from you.  With thousands of condos and hundreds of condo offices that are often closed or unmanned, we cannot track down every owner.  This is why we work hard to go above and beyond the minimum of what the law requires.  We love our customers, we love what we do and we work hard to do it well with integrity.

He recommended a different website to purchase another fob, and we replaced the battery.

Once the second  fob arrived, Ethan came BACK out at NO CHARGE and was able to get the key programmed. If Ethan can salvage our mess of a situation, I'm sure he can handle yours! If I ever have key issues again, Ethan is my first and only call.

Thank you, Ethan.

text: Rick was the locksmith who came to our home today.  We cannot say enough to express our satisfaction with the work he did.  He made the initial repair we called about and checked all our other locks as well.  It is so nice to feel comfortable when you have to call someone to your home for repairs. We would recommend Alabama Lock & Key to anyone needing this service.  Thank you Rick.

name: James Leithart
text: After my most recent experience I would definitely go back here for any lock/key needs in the future. I had a couple of poor experiences due to miscommunication. However, after hearing about my experience, Randy got in contact with me and asked me to bring my rooftop box back to the office and they would either get it fixed or replaced. The technician worked tirelessly in order to get my lock cylinder replaced and I picked up my fixed box within 24 hours. On top of that, I wasn’t charged for the fix. Would 100% go back if I needed anything after they went above and beyond in order to assure that I was happy with my experience.

name: Han Bowers
text: I wish I could give these guys 10 out of 5! Ask for Cameron and tip him too! I just bought a Chinese knock off of a honda scooter. No one else in town would give me the time of day to even explain what it was they just said they couldn't do it, even motorcycle dealerships! When I came in Cameron was hesitant to be sue he could do the job but never told me he couldn't! He said he would try his best and I should hear back in 3 or 4 days.... Instead he had it done the morning after! (I had come in at the end of the day before). When I came to pick it up he even took the time to explain how he fixed it and told me they took the time to figure out it didn't need a honda key at all, instead it was a GM key! Best customer service in town.

name: David “davz45” C.
text:
We needed there help with a key replacement for our mazda 3.
Mr Beasley was fantastic working with our car making numerous trips figuring out the actual problem..it was a relay fuse that a parts store employee damaged, he was very persistent in diagnosing the problem and got us on the road!
The entire staff was fantastic, but this technician went way beyond his duties.
Alabama lock owners need too know what a good man they have representing there company!

name: A. R. Walker
text: My husband and I just had an iron security door with lockset installed and two additional non-working locksets replaced on other doors and ended up with FIVE different keys. Knowing this was going to cause some problems, since both my husband and I have keys to all of his father’s home and cars and my mother’s home and car, plus our cars, we knew we had to do something. It was after closing hours at Alabama Lock and Key, but we made the call and received service immediately. With our problem resolved, we have the right number of keys to keep us sane!!!!
